generalItems.name: Particular key
generalItems.description: Only opens a particular lock. Doesn't have to be an actual key or an actual lock.

generalItems.name: Bottle
generalItems.description: Can hold a potion, bug, or pixie.

generalItems.name: Dowsing Rod
generalItems.description: Vibrates in rooms where something is hidden.

generalItems.name: Magic Flute
generalItems.description: The user can summon a portal to the closest town. The portal stays open until heroes travel back through it. If a new portal opens, the previous portal closes.

generalItems.name: Large Pouch
generalItems.description: Grants a total of 8 inventory slots. Replaces a small pouch.

generalItems.name: Hero's Bow
generalItems.description: +1D for ranged ATTACK rolls. Unlimited arrows.

generalItems.name: Hero's Armor
generalItems.description: Any time the wearer would lose a HEART, they lose half a HEART instead. (Use a pen to draw lines down the middle of your HEART symbols).
